org.purewidgets.client.widgets
Class PdTagCloud

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              org.purewidgets.client.widgets.PdWidget
                  org.purewidgets.client.widgets.PdTagCloud
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasVisibility, IsRenderable, IsWidget, InputFeedbackListener, ReferenceCodeListener, WidgetInputListener
public class PdTagCloud
extends PdWidget

A visual representation of a tag cloud that allows users to add new tags.

CSS Style Rules

.pw-GuiTagCloud
the outer <div> element
.pw-GuiTagCloud .tag
the <span> element for each word
.pw-GuiTagCloud .tagspanel
the panel that holds the list of tags and the textbox

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Constructor Detail

PdTagCloud

@UiConstructor
public PdTagCloud(String widgetId)
Creates a new tag cloud with the specified widget id.

Parameters:
widgetId - The widget id.

PdTagCloud

public PdTagCloud(String widgetId,
                  boolean allowUserInput)
Creates a new tag cloud with the specified widget id and control over whether users can add new tags.

Parameters:
widgetId - The widget id
allowUserInput - if true, users can add new tags; if false, they cannot.

PdTagCloud

public PdTagCloud(String widgetId,
                  String[] tags,
                  int[] frequency,
                  boolean allowUserInput)
Creates a new tag cloud with the specified widget id, initial tag and frequency sets, and control over whether users can add new tags.

Parameters:
widgetId - The widget id
tags - The initial set of tags
frequency - The initial frequency for each tag
allowUserInput - if true, users can add new tags; if false, they cannot.

getTagListSortedByFrequency

public ArrayList<TagCloud.Tag> getTagListSortedByFrequency(boolean desc)
Gets a list of tags ordered by frequency.

Parameters:
desc - if true, the tags are ordered in descending manner; if false, the tags are ordered in ascending manner.
